properties.body:
NORTH ATLANTIC.
1. TEN METER S/V ZEN, WHITE AND GRAY HULL,
   ONE PERSON ON BOARD, DISABLED AND ADRIFT
   DUE TO RUDDER PROBLEMS IN 16-09N 050-02W.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A
   SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS
   TO MRCC FORT DE FRANCE, TELEX: 42912008,
   PHONE: 5965 9670 9292, FAX: 5965 9663 2450.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 19/13.
